mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id, r.building_id, b.building_name, r.room_number, r.full_name, r.total_beds, r.occupied_beds, r.room_status, r.room_type, r.has_private_bathroom FROM t_dorm_room r LEFT JOIN t_dorm_building b ON r.building_id = b.building_id WHERE r.room_id = #{roomId}

SELECT r.room_id, r.building_id, b.building_name, r.room_number, r.full_name, r.total_beds, r.occupied_beds, r.room_status, r.room_type, r.has_private_bathroom FROM t_dorm_room r INNER JOIN t_dorm_building b ON r.building_id = b.building_id
AND r.building_id = #{buildingId}
AND r.room_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{roomNumber}, '%')
AND r.occupied_beds = 0
AND r.occupied_beds > 0 AND r.occupied_beds < r.total_beds
AND r.occupied_beds >= r.total_beds
ORDER BY r.room_id

SELECT r.* FROM t_dorm_room r INNER JOIN t_dorm_building b ON r.building_id = b.building_id WHERE r.room_status = 1 AND r.occupied_beds < r.total_beds
AND r.building_id = #{buildingId}
AND (b.gender_limit = 0 OR b.gender_limit = #{genderLimit})
ORDER BY r.room_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dorm_room (building_id, room_number, full_name, total_beds, occupied_beds, room_status, room_type, has_private_bathroom) VALUES (#{buildingId}, #{roomNumber}, #{fullName}, #{totalBeds}, #{occupiedBeds}, #{roomStatus}, #{roomType}, #{hasPrivateBathroom})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_dorm_room SET room_status = #{roomStatus} WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
UPDATE t_dorm_room SET occupied_beds = #{occupiedBeds} WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
